about_description: We create bigger, bolder, and better digital ideas. We believe in the flexibility and precision of great ideas. We are the best financial solution provider and consultancy globally. Diverse software and web development services.
workplace: Workplace of numerous experts and engineers
free_training: Organize free training courses and events on React with domestic and international experts
vision_description: Asserting the pioneering position as the first and largest company specializing in React in the market.
mission_point1: Provide experts in React & React Native
mission_point2: Satisfy customers with the highest quality.
mission_point3: Build the largest React engineer community in Vietnam.
awards_certificates_description1: React Plus achieved the dual goal of meeting ISO 9001:2015 standards for quality management and ISO 27001:2013 for information security management in the field of software production and processing, certified by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO).
awards_certificates_description2: We are proud to be the first unit in Vietnam to specialize deeply in React & React Native, with the ability to provide services that satisfy all customers according to international standards.
address: 7, Row 2, Lane 651 Minh Khai, Hai Ba Trung, Hanoi
